ambient_Farm_Steve: So this is the farm! Neat.
ambient_Farm_Steve~2: Man, I didn't know you had a pet.
ambient_UndergroundMine_Steve~1: I can't have you getting hurt.
ambient_UndergroundMine_Steve~4: Don't you worry about a thing, @.
ambient_Desert_Steve: Man, I've missed this kinda heat.
ambient_Desert_Steve~1: Oh- did ya see that? A scorpion!
ambient_BusStop_Steve: Hey, uh, @? I forgot my bus fare.
ambient_BusStop_Steve~1: Can we go to Zuzu City?
ambient_Forest_Steve~1: I should take you here more often.
ambient_Forest_Steve~3: These trees oddly all look the same.
ambient_Mountain_Steve: Didn't think I was gonna hike today.
ambient_Mountain_Steve~1: I should take Vincent up here.
ambient_Mountain_Steve~2: The kids would love it here.
ambient_Beach_Steve~1: Is that Alex's ball in the sand?
ambient_Beach_Steve~4: Tempted to go in the sea?
ambient_Woods_Steve~3: You got mud on your forehead.
ambient_Sewer_Steve: Why are down here? It stinks.
ambient_Sewer_Steve~2: You choose to spend time down here?
ambient_BugLand_Steve~1: The way my bat hits those bugs...
fight_Steve~9: You take care of yourself good.
